title: Product Not As Described
complaint_description: Product differs from online description: missing features.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
Collect photos and details to escalate to catalog team for correction.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #9938. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
